posts.post_content:
I have two OJs that I am hoping to trade for different n172s. Trade options don't have to be in the best shape as the cards I have are not either.

email me at [url]tlwise12@aol.com[/url]

The Canavan has an interesting back stamp, but both cards have pretty good images on it. 

Travis


I MAY be open to trading a newly acquired Cartwright. He is a decently tough card to get and is in about the same shape as the others...
